name: CubeBall VR
description:
Classic puzzle games recreated in VR


Did you ever play with little cubes with balls inside it?
Just roll the balls to where they belong. Seems easy, but it's not!

Carefully designed to bring back classic puzzles to VR.

There are even more fun and interesting puzzles that was designed from scratch.
New puzzles have moving parts that was not possible in physical form.
More puzzles will be added.

Supported VR

It currently supports HTC Vive . Oculus Touch support planned.
